snippet: Two Octobers ago, Jayson Werth was one pitch from a chance at glory. It never came. On Thursday, he got another shot, and delivered.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column on Washington Nationals outfielder Jayson Werth, who kept the team's playoff hopes alive with ninth-inning homer in Game 4 of National League division series against St Louis Cardinals; says that Werth proved his contract value with one swing.
lead_paragraph: Two Octobers ago, Jayson Werth was one pitch from a chance at glory. It never came. On Thursday, he got another shot, and delivered.

headline.seo: Jayson Werth Delivers Big Hit for Nationals
headline.main: After a Lifetime of Waiting, the Big Hit
headline.print_headline: After a Lifetime of Waiting, the Big Hit
